verses.verse: And these are the countries which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> inherited <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, distributed for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to them.

By lot <S%H1486><s%> was their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, for the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%>, and for the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>.

For Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and an half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: but unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> none inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: therefore they gave <S%H5414><s%> no part <S%H2506><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, save cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and for their substance <S%H7075><s%>.
As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%>, and they divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>: and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite <S%H7074><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> concerning me <S%H182><s%> and thee <S%H182><s%> in Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> was I when Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me from Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%> to espy out <S%H7270><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; and I brought <S%H7725><s%> him word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> as it was in mine heart <S%H3824><s%>.

Nevertheless my brethren <S%H251><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> with me made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melt <S%H4529><s%>: but I wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Surely the land <S%H776><s%> whereon thy feet <S%H7272><s%> have trodden <S%H1869><s%> shall be thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and thy children's <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, because thou hast wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.

And now, behold, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath kept me alive <S%H2421><s%>, as he said <S%H1696><s%>, these forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, even since <S%H227><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, while the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wandered <S%H1980><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and now, lo, I am this day <S%H3117><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>. wandered: Heb. walked

As yet I am as strong <S%H2389><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> as I was in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me: as my strength <S%H3581><s%> was then, even so is my strength <S%H3581><s%> now, for war <S%H4421><s%>, both to go out <S%H3318><s%>, and to come in <S%H935><s%>.

Now therefore give <S%H5414><s%> me this mountain <S%H2022><s%>, whereof the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>; for thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> how the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> were there, and that the cities <S%H5892><s%> were great <S%H1419><s%> and fenced <S%H1219><s%>: if so be <S%H194><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will be with <S%H854><s%> me, then I shall be able to drive them out <S%H3423><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

Hebron <S%H2275><s%> therefore became the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite <S%H7074><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, because that he wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjatharba <S%H7153><s%>; which Arba was a great <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among the Anakims <S%H6062><s%>. And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war <S%H4421><s%>.
